page.title: 08PEOPLE OF BRYNNA
page.content: The{population}of Brynna is approx' 4000. It is generally a young population. With 1000 houses. This works out at an average of 4 people per house.(2 adults and 2 children). {Thomas Frederick William}is Britain's greatest friend to horses. The most famous Smith in Britain.There are a few quotations used by National Press Reporters over the years in the puplicity given to the Brynnau blacksmith,Thomas Federick William. {Ron Prichard.}Ron started boxing at the age of 15, at the high corner yard,Llanharan.Ron boxed all over South Wales during his career and also was a big favourite at Glocester and Stroud,where he had a terrific fight with Eddie Damazel. Boxing as a bantam weight. By{ {Danny Morris } and {Mark Cox.
